meanings.definition: A person who works in a supporting role in a professional field, typically requiring some specialized training but not a full professional qualification.
meanings.sent1: The school district hired paraprofessionals to assist teachers in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The hospital employed paraprofessionals to help with patient care.
meanings.sent3: The paraprofessionals organized a fun event for the staff during their break.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the paraprofessionals were the unsung heroes behind the scenes.
meanings.sent5: The group of paraprofessionals worked diligently to support the main professionals.
